title: Statement by the President on Senator Lautenberg | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
February 14, 2013

 



Statement by the President on Senator Lautenberg




Frank is a steadfast champion of the people of New Jersey. Throughout his time in the Senate, Frank has fought tirelessly for workers, veterans, members of our military and their families, and immigrants, and he continues to make extraordinary contributions to our nationâ€™s safety, and the health and welfare of our citizens. His service in World War II is a testament to his character and deep commitment to public service. I look forward to working with Frank on critical issues before us these next two years, and Michelle and I wish him and Bonnie all the best.
